thread.title: DMasty Chan
thread.title_full: eUKhost Ltd reviewed by DMasty Chan

author: DMasty Chan
title: DMasty Chan
text:
Great service highly recommend, Neil Wilson from the sales team who always there to handle any of server query, he is my account manager and I am very happy with his support, always available on Skype to help.
I have two dedicated server and never faced any issues such as down time, All guys are excellent
Thankyou eUkhost and Neil Wilson
